title: Authentic Harappan Civilization Bronze Coin
description: Rare 4500-year-old bronze coin from the Indus Valley Civilization, certified authentic
content: This extraordinary artifact is a genuine bronze coin from the ancient Harappan civilization, dating back to 2600-1900 BCE during the mature period of the Indus Valley civilization. Meticulously preserved, this coin features characteristic Harappan symbols that offer a tangible connection to one of the world's earliest urban cultures. Certified by the Archaeological Survey of India, it was excavated from the Mohenjo-Daro site in Sindh, Pakistan. The 22mm diameter coin weighs 8.5g and displays remarkable preservation of its original patina and markings. Collectors will appreciate its historical significance as a rare surviving example of early monetary systems. The obverse side bears geometric patterns typical of Harappan craftsmanship, while the reverse shows undeciphered script that continues to puzzle archaeologists. This piece comes with a lifetime authenticity guarantee and detailed provenance documentation. Ideal for serious collectors or museums, it's presented in a protective archival-quality display case with UV-resistant glass. Due to its antiquity and fragile nature, shipping includes specialized packing with climate-controlled options available. A certificate of authenticity signed by a recognized archaeologist accompanies the coin, along with a booklet about Harappan numismatics.

title: Luxury 800 Thread Count Egyptian Cotton Bedsheet
description: Queen size bedsheet set with premium sateen weave for ultimate comfort
content: Experience hotel-quality luxury every night with our premium 800 thread count Egyptian cotton bedsheet set. Woven with extra-long staple fibers for exceptional softness that improves with each wash, these sateen-weave sheets offer a subtle sheen and buttery smooth hand feel. The queen-size set (90x100 inches) features deep pockets to accommodate mattresses up to 18 inches thick with reinforced elastic corners that stay securely in place. Crafted from 100% organic Egyptian cotton grown along the Nile Delta, the fabric is OEKO-TEX certified free from harmful chemicals. The ivory white color provides a timeless, elegant foundation for any bedroom decor while remaining cool and breathable year-round. Unlike lower thread count sheets, our 800 TC construction ensures durability that withstands hundreds of washes without pilling. The set includes one fitted sheet, one flat sheet, and two standard pillowcases - all featuring double-stitched hems for added longevity. Care is simple: machine wash cold with mild detergent and tumble dry low. For those seeking sustainable luxury, these sheets are produced in an ethical Indian factory powered by renewable energy.

attributes.careInstructions: Machine wash cold, tumble dry low

title: 2024 Kawasaki Ninja 650 ABS
description: Sporty middleweight motorcycle with 649cc parallel-twin engine and aggressive styling
content: The 2024 Kawasaki Ninja 650 ABS combines track-inspired styling with everyday rideability in a middleweight sportbike package. Its 649cc parallel-twin engine delivers 68 PS of power and 64 Nm of torque through a smooth 6-speed transmission with assist-and-slipper clutch for precise gear changes. The lightweight trellis frame and 41mm telescopic front forks provide agile handling, while dual 300mm petal disc brakes with ABS ensure confident stopping power. Modern features include a vibrant 4.3-inch TFT display with smartphone connectivity via Kawasaki's Rideology app, LED lighting throughout, and an adjustable windscreen for improved wind protection. The aggressive Ninja styling includes sharp bodywork available in signature Lime Green or stealthy Ebony colors. With a 15-liter fuel tank offering approximately 300km range, this bike is equally capable of spirited canyon rides or daily commuting. The ergonomic stepped seat (790mm height) and slightly upright riding position reduce fatigue on longer rides. Includes 2-year manufacturer 'warranty' and optional extended coverage. Available for test rides at authorized dealerships with complimentary first service included.

title: Premium Organic Assam Tea Leaves - 100g
description: First flush whole leaf tea from certified organic gardens in Assam
content: Sourced from certified organic estates in Assam's Brahmaputra Valley, these first flush whole leaf teas represent the finest spring harvest of 2023. The rich, malty character characteristic of Assam teas comes through prominently in this batch, with notes of dried fruit and a distinctive coppery liquor. Grown without synthetic pesticides or fertilizers, the leaves are hand-plucked by experienced tea pickers who select only the top two leaves and a bud for premium quality. After withering, the leaves undergo careful oxidation to develop their full-bodied flavor before being sorted and packed in nitrogen-flushed foil pouches to preserve freshness. Each 100g package yields approximately 50 cups of robust tea ideal for morning consumption. USDA Organic and India Organic certified, this tea is rich in antioxidants and naturally contains about 50-60mg caffeine per cup. Brewing recommendations: use 1 teaspoon per 200ml water at 90°C (just below boiling) for 3-4 minutes. Can be enjoyed plain or with milk and sweetener. The leaves may be reinfused 2-3 times, with subsequent brews revealing more nuanced flavors. Directly supports sustainable farming communities in Assam through fair trade practices.

attributes.brewingInstructions: 1 tsp per cup, 90°C water, steep 3-4 minutes

seo.metaTitle: Buy Organic Assam Tea Leaves Online
seo.metaDescription: Premium first flush organic Assam tea leaves direct from plantation

title: OnePlus 11 5G (Titan Black, 12GB RAM, 256GB Storage)
description: Flagship smartphone with Snapdragon 8 Gen 2, 120Hz AMOLED, and Hasselblad camera
content: The OnePlus 11 5G redefines flagship performance with its Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 processor and 12GB LPDDR5X RAM, delivering desktop-class power in a sleek 6.7" form factor. The 120Hz QHD+ AMOLED display with LTPO 3.0 technology automatically adjusts refresh rate from 1-120Hz for buttery smooth visuals while conserving battery. Hasselblad-tuned triple camera system includes a 50MP Sony IMX890 main sensor with OIS, 48MP ultra-wide, and 32MP portrait lens - all supporting 10-bit color capture for professional-grade photography. The 5000mAh battery charges to 100% in just 25 minutes using the included 100W SuperVOOC charger while maintaining excellent longevity through advanced power management. OxygenOS 13 based on Android 13 provides a clean, bloatware-free experience with guaranteed 4 years of security updates. The Titan Black model features a stunning matte glass back with anti-fingerprint coating and durable Gorilla Glass Victus protection. Includes alert slider for quick sound profiles, dual stereo speakers tuned by Dolby Atmos, and an in-display fingerprint sensor. Pre-installed screen protector and premium sandstone case complement the premium unboxing experience.

reviews.comment: Blazing fast performance and incredible camera quality
